title: Epic & Nintendo Disagree on Samus in Fortnite - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.23.24
description:
Blessing and Tim debate Samus in Fortnite, talk about Embracer CEO's response to criticism, and Infogrames makes a return so we learn a new song!

Sign up for the Kinda Funny Membership to get ad-free shows, live recordings, and daily Greg Miller vlogs. Patreon.com/KindaFunny or YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames
